EmailTemplate.subject: Everyone Will Want to See the 2012 Ford Focus. Make Sure They See it at Your Dealership.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The ALL NEW 2012 Ford Focus is about to take America by storm. Already being hailed as the "Single Best Compact Car in the World," you are going to want to make sure that you are the first in your area to get the word out.
Our 2012 Focus Fulfillment Package captures the energy and excitement of this all new vehicle. When it arrives in the mail and email boxes of your potential customers, or when they see the banner on your site, you can be sure it will catch their eye and make them want to know more. Then the information it shares will fuel their desire to come see it for themselves.
The 2012 Focus is, without a doubt, the next big car. People are going to want to see it, so make sure, when they do, it's at your dealership.
Ford is already shipping the first round of these vehicles, so the time is now to start building the buzz. Call your sales representative or send an email to vintelligentmarketing@vinsolutions.com, today, to start the process of getting this package out to potential customers in your area.
